lines.text: Yes, Freddy, cops in Haiti are extremely scary.
I will pluck out your tongues with bull cutters and roast them, and I will take your brains and chill them for the purposes of garnishment.
As we continue to nurture our hate, the loss of our humanity will quicken evermore.
There's nothing more for us in this world now except for revenge.
Tommy and-and Bill and that new kid. They're dead, just... murdered.
Hey man, let me hang at your pad tonight!
Come on, be a pal! my mom won't let me in the house.
Your own mom won't let you in the house?
Ahahahahah, All right, come on asshole!
Hey, thanks Boog, thanks a lot.
